title: Bond for minor
context: §804-12 Bond for minor. When the person admitted to bail is a minor the bond shall notwithstanding be valid. [PC 1869, c 50, §11; RL 1925, §3988; RL 1935, §5442; RL 1945, §10742; RL 1955, §256-12; HRS §709-12; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; am L 1980, c 195, §1] Cross References Minors, see §571-32(f).
